com.yahoo.bullet.typesystem

Class GenericTypeAdapterFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.bullet.typesystem.GenericTypeAdapterFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The base type that this factory handles.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory

    public class GenericTypeAdapterFactory<T>
extends Object
implements com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
    Adapted from Google GSON's RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory to support a generic type adapter. Instead of adding a new field to the top level and determining the type based off of that, this accepts various Predicate on a JsonElement for each type in order to decide which TypeAdapter to use. When deserializing JSON, the predicate is applied to the JsonElement and checked to see if it is true for a subtype (in order of registry). If it is, the JSON is attempted to be deserialized into that subtype (and returned as an element of the base type T). Serializing JSON is done as normal without any changes to the output JSON. This avoid the extraneous type field in the original RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory.
